title: HOOD Motors — Red header typography and iconography

requirements.summary: Make all visible header text and icons render in red across desktop header and mobile sheet menu while preserving existing scroll/nav behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On desktop, the HOOD wordmark and all nav link labels render in red in the sticky header.
The “Book Test Drive” CTA label renders in red (not black/white) and remains readable against its background.
On mobile, the hamburger/menu trigger icon renders in red.
In the mobile sheet menu, the HOOD wordmark and all nav link labels render in red.
Header navigation/scroll behavior and the mobile sheet open/close behavior continue to work as before.

file_operations.description: Adjust Tailwind classes in the existing header to render all header typography and iconography in red (use existing accent/red styling) including: desktop wordmark, desktop nav link labels, “Book Test Drive” label, mobile menu trigger icon, and mobile sheet menu wordmark + nav links, while keeping the current scroll-to-section and Sheet open/close behavior unchanged and without editing any files under frontend/src/components/ui. Continue composing the existing shadcn-ui Button and Sheet components for the CTA and mobile menu; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
